page.title: 14School playtime games
page.content: Our yard is very large and during our playtime we play soccer,cricket, rounders,skipping,hide and seek and many other games.We enjoy having the infants to join us in a game of"I sent a letter to my love".Everyone sits in a circle and one person runs around the outside carrying a handkerchief. The person listens to the rhyme and when the others start to say the alphabet,he or she drops the hankie behind a seated person.That person rises and chases the other around the ring before reaching the empty spot.If the first person is caught she or he has to sit in the middle and suck his thumb.Elastic skipping is also popular A circular chain is made of elastic bands. Two people stand in the chain using their ankles to keep it straight and a third person skips in and out. (By Karen Perris of Hafod CP school)
